Class AmazonProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • AmazonProduct
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DVD, Milk, Shirt

    public abstract class AmazonProduct
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class: Amazon Product The Amazon Product class defines the methods and fields that all Amazon products have in common: fields: price, name, category, number of stars (1-5), eligibility for Prime shipping, and barcode methods: calcTax() - to calculate the tax isEligible() - returns true if the product is eligible for Prime shipping, false otherwise We calculate tax differently depending on the kind of product, and not every product is eligible for Prime shipping.
